text: Konrad Pettersson (1 July 1903 in Älvsbyn, Sweden - 18 November 1976 in Piteå, Sweden), was a Swedish cross-country skier. He won Vasaloppet in 1927. He represented Luleå SK in club competitions. == References == Category:1976 deaths Category:1903 births Category:Swedish male cross-country skiers Category:Vasaloppet winners
title: Konrad Pettersson
